short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Some links only open in new tabs when you click them, this extension adds an option to open the link in the current tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Some links only open in new tabs when you click them, this extension adds an option in the context menu for a right click on a link for opening the link in the current tab.
